    • Method Detail

      • createChallengeForUser

        java.lang.String createChallengeForUser(UserModel userModel)
        create new challenge for provided userModel the sha-512 hash will be stored
        Parameters:
        userModel - userModel the challenge is created for
        Returns:
        the not hashed challenge, null if error occurred

      • searchChallengeForUser

        ChallengeModel searchChallengeForUser(UserModel userModel)
        Search the challenge for the provided userModel
        Parameters:
        userModel - userModel which challenge is searched
        Returns:
        challengeModel for the provided userModel, null if error occured

      • getChallengeForUser

        public java.lang.String getChallengeForUser(UserModel userModel)
        get challenge for the provided user if it does not exist it will be created
        Parameters:
        userModel - userModel the challenge is searched or created for
        Returns:
        the not hashed challenge

      • deleteOldChallenges

        public boolean deleteOldChallenges(java.util.Date now)
        delete old challenges stored in the database challenges just have limited valid range
        Parameters:
        now - the Date, everything with notValidAfter before this will be deleted
        Returns:
        true
